tiers.name: Minor Shift
tiers.description: Create a 1m patch of random, chaotic terrain (e.g., ice, mud, thorns).

tiers.name: Random Stumble
tiers.description: Inflict a random -1 penalty on one of target's Derived Stats (Con, End, Agi, Aware) for 1 round.

tiers.name: Unstable Field
tiers.description: Create a 3m radius field. All characters (friend or foe) in it suffer a -1 penalty to one randomly determined core stat.

tiers.name: Area Mutate
tiers.description: Create a 5m radius field of chaotic terrain, imposing a -1 penalty on Agility for 2 rounds.

tiers.name: Psychic Feedback
tiers.description: Target must pass a Willpower check (DC 15) or suffer Composure damage equal to the resource cost of their last ability used.

tiers.name: Curse of Probability
tiers.description: Target an enemy (Willpower save DC 15). For 3 rounds, any time they roll a 1d20, they must roll twice and take the worse result (Disadvantage).

tiers.name: Reality Ripple
tiers.description: All non-essential objects in a 10m area are randomly destroyed, moved, or turned into something else.

tiers.name: Mass Instability
tiers.description: Create a 5m radius field. All characters (friend or foe) in it must pass a Willpower check (DC 17) or be Stunned for 1 round.

tiers.name: Full Entropy
tiers.description: Cause Minor Injuries to 1d4 randomly determined limbs on 1 target (Willpower save DC 18 to resist).

tiers.name: Random Blast
tiers.description: Deal 1d10 damage of a randomly determined type.

tiers.name: Unstable Bolt
tiers.description: Deal 2d6 damage. If the damage roll is even, the target is Staggered. If it's odd, they are Hindered (Movement).

tiers.name: Chaos Field
tiers.description: Create a 3m radius field that deals 1d6 random damage to any (friend or foe) character that starts its turn there.

tiers.name: Volatile Charge
tiers.description: Attack deals 2d6 damage, and the target must pass a Vitality save (DC 14) or immediately suffer a T1 Poison or Bleed status (randomly determined).

tiers.name: Unpredictable Nova
tiers.description: Deal 6d6 damage, split randomly between 1d6 targets (friend or foe) in a 10m radius.

tiers.name: Chain Chaos
tiers.description: Your next attack deals 3d6 random elemental damage. If it hits, it immediately arcs to a random target within 5m (friend or foe) for 2d6 random damage.

tiers.name: Full Cataclysm
tiers.description: Deal 6d6 damage that is randomly split between HP, Composure, and primary Resource pools of the target.

tiers.name: Paradox Strike
tiers.description: Deal damage equal to your Intuition score multiplied by 3 to a randomly determined target (friend or foe) within 10m.

tiers.name: Dimensional Rift
tiers.description: Create a 5m radius rift. All characters (friend or foe) in the area suffer 5d6 random damage and 2d6 Composure damage.

tiers.name: Minor Surge
tiers.description: Randomly boost one of your core stats (A-L) by +1 for 1 round.

tiers.name: Resist Random
tiers.description: Gain a +2 bonus resistance against the next 2 instances of random damage or status effects.

tiers.name: Ally Mutation
tiers.description: Target an ally. Randomly grant them a T2-level physical advantage (e.g., hardened skin, speed boost) for 3 rounds.

tiers.name: Self-Morph
tiers.description: You mutate your form for 3 rounds. Choose one: Gills (breathe water), Claws (1d6 Unarmed damage), or Wings (Flight 5m).

tiers.name: Weapon Mutation
tiers.description: Permanently change your weapon's damage type (e.g., Slashing -> Impact) and grant it +1 damage bonus.

tiers.name: Elemental Randomize
tiers.description: Grant all allies immunity to a T1 elemental damage type (randomly determined) for 3 rounds.

tiers.name: Reality Shift
tiers.description: Instantly change the weather or environmental lighting for the remainder of the encounter.

tiers.name: Full Mutation
tiers.description: Grant yourself 1d4 randomly determined T3 physical bonuses (e.g., Flight, Regeneration) for 3 rounds.

tiers.name: Reality Inversion
tiers.description: (Full Action) You tear a hole in reality. All allies in 10m are healed for 4d6 HP. All enemies in 10m suffer 4d6 direct damage. You, the caster, must pass a Willpower save (DC 18) or be Stunned for 1 round by the backlash.

tiers.name: Distract
tiers.description: Target 1 enemy. Suffer a -1 penalty to all actions for 1 round.

tiers.name: Push Object
tiers.description: Telekinetically move a small object (max weight 10kg) 5m.

tiers.name: Daze
tiers.description: Target 1 enemy. Impose the Staggered status effect for 1 round (Willpower save DC 14 to resist).

tiers.name: Mental Confusion
tiers.description: Target suffers a -2 penalty to all Willpower checks for 3 rounds (Willpower save DC 14 to resist).

tiers.name: Unravel Focus
tiers.description: Target immediately loses Focus and cannot use abilities that require concentration for 2 rounds (Willpower save DC 15 to resist).

tiers.name: Mind Spike
tiers.description: Deal 3d6 direct Composure damage (Willpower save DC 15 for half) and drain 1d4 Guile.

tiers.name: Brain Lock
tiers.description: Inflict 2d6 Composure damage. If this drops Composure to zero, the target is instantly Immobilized in Fear for 3 rounds.

tiers.name: Puppet Master
tiers.description: Gain temporary control of a non-hostile NPC for 1 round (Willpower save DC 17 to resist).

tiers.name: Mindwipe
tiers.description: Erase the target's memory of the last 10 minutes (Willpower save DC 18 to resist).

tiers.name: Mental Echo
tiers.description: Deal 1d6 direct Composure damage.

tiers.name: Object Hurl
tiers.description: Deal 1d10 damage by violently throwing a nearby object at the target.

tiers.name: Psychic Drain
tiers.description: Drain 1d6 from the target's Instinct pool (Willpower save DC 14 for half).

tiers.name: Psychic Crush
tiers.description: Deal 3d6 direct Composure damage (Willpower save DC 14 for half).

tiers.name: Psychic Scream
tiers.description: Deal 2d6 damage to the Composure pools of all targets in a 5m cone.

tiers.name: Targeted Concussion
tiers.description: Deal 3d6 damage. Target must pass a Vitality check (DC 15) or be Stunned for 1 round.

tiers.name: Mental Disintegration
tiers.description: Target's armor suffers a Major Injury (becomes broken/unusable) as you telekinetically tear it apart (Willpower save DC 16 to resist).

tiers.name: Composure Collapse
tiers.description: Inflict 5d6 points of Major Composure damage.

tiers.name: Mass Hurl
tiers.description: Throw up to 3 enemies 5m away (Willpower save DC 18 to remain in place).

tiers.name: Mind Shield
tiers.description: Gain a +2 bonus defense to your next Composure check.

tiers.name: Barrier
tiers.description: Create a temporary shield that absorbs the next 1d8 damage instances.

tiers.name: Group Defense
tiers.description: Grant +1 defense to all allies within 5m for 1 round.

tiers.name: Telekinetic Shield
tiers.description: Create a sustained barrier that absorbs up to 15 total points of damage for 3 rounds.

tiers.name: Psychic Repulsion
tiers.description: Enemies attempting to enter a 3m radius around you suffer 1d6 Composure damage.

tiers.name: Clarity
tiers.description: Restore 2d6 Composure to yourself or an ally and remove the Shaken status.

tiers.name: Projected Will
tiers.description: Transfer your Willpower score as a bonus to an ally's Defense for 3 rounds.

tiers.name: Mass Clarity
tiers.description: Restore 3d6 Composure to all allies within 5m.

tiers.name: Mind Fortress
tiers.description: (Full Action) Create a 10m aura for 3 rounds. All allies in the aura are immune to all Composure damage and mental status effects (Fear, Charm, Stun). You, the caster, gain +5 to your Willpower stat for the duration.

tiers.name: Fluster
tiers.description: Target 1 enemy. They suffer a -1 penalty to their next Defense roll.

tiers.name: Draw Gaze
tiers.description: Compel target to only look at you for 1 round.

tiers.name: Vulnerable Posture
tiers.description: Target suffers a -2 penalty to their next Willpower check.

tiers.name: Target Lock
tiers.description: Compel a group of enemies (3m radius) to prioritize a single designated target (Willpower save DC 14).

tiers.name: Mass Confusion
tiers.description: All enemies in a 5m radius suffer a -1 penalty to Awareness checks for 3 rounds.

tiers.name: Opening Attack
tiers.description: Grant the next ally attacking the target a +2 bonus to their attack roll.

tiers.name: Mass Demoralize
tiers.description: Target all enemies in a 5m radius. Inflict 2d6 Composure damage.

tiers.name: Compel Surrender
tiers.description: Force a non-hostile NPC to immediately surrender (Willpower save DC 17).

tiers.name: Total Loyalty
tiers.description: Instantly turn a hostile NPC of T4 or lower into a temporary ally for the remainder of the encounter.

tiers.name: Marked Target
tiers.description: Designate one target. The next ally to attack them gets a +1 bonus to their attack roll.

tiers.name: Exploit Opportunity
tiers.description: Target an enemy. Grant the next ally attacking them a +1d4 bonus to their damage roll.

tiers.name: Piercing Command
tiers.description: Your next attack also gives an adjacent ally +2 Armor Pierce against that target for 1 round.

tiers.name: Coordinated Strike
tiers.description: Grant all adjacent allies a +1d4 bonus damage roll on their next successful attack against that target.

tiers.name: Strategic Opening
tiers.description: Target an enemy. The enemy suffers a -2 penalty to Defense against all incoming attacks for 1 round.

tiers.name: Focus Fire
tiers.description: Grant all allies a +1 bonus to all attack rolls against a single designated target for 2 rounds.

tiers.name: Leadership Momentum
tiers.description: Deliver an attack. If successful, all allies in the encounter gain +2m movement on their next turn.

tiers.name: Coordinated Assault
tiers.description: Your successful attack also grants an adjacent ally a free T1 (1d4 damage) attack against the target.

tiers.name: Rally Strike of Annihilation
tiers.description: Your successful attack allows all allies to make a free T1 (1d4 damage) attack against the target immediately.

tiers.name: Inspiring Word
tiers.description: Restore 1d6 Composure OR 1d4 HP to yourself or an adjacent ally.

tiers.name: Remove Shaken
tiers.description: Instantly remove the Shaken status from an ally.

tiers.name: Rallying Cry
tiers.description: Restore 2d4 Composure to all allies within 5m.

tiers.name: Unbreakable Morale
tiers.description: Grant all allies immunity to T1 Fear effects for 3 rounds.

tiers.name: Group Resolve
tiers.description: All allies within 5m gain a +2 bonus to all Willpower checks for 3 rounds.

tiers.name: Battlefield Command
tiers.description: Grant up to 2 allies a bonus 2m movement on their next turn.

tiers.name: Mass Clarity
tiers.description: Restore 3d6 Composure to all allies within 10m.

tiers.name: Immunity Aura
tiers.description: Grant all allies immunity to Composure loss for 2 rounds.

tiers.name: Total Dominance
tiers.description: Grant all allies a temporary +2 increase to their Charm stat for the remainder of the encounter.
